item.title: CVE-2024-24889|2024-02-12T06:12:33.034Z -- Geek Code Lab -- All 404 Pages Redirect to Homepage
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Geek Code Lab All 404 Pages Redirect to Homepage allows Stored XSS.This issue affects All 404 Pages Redirect to Homepage: from n/a through 1.9.
